name: AI Insurance
headline: AI Insurance is the platform that runs insurance companies
description: AI Insurance is the platform that small-to-midsize insurance companies use to run every part of their business. Before we showed up, they used spreadsheets and filing cabinets – wasting as much as 60% of revenue on administrative expenses. We’re doing what Salesforce did for SMB sales teams, but we’re tapping into the over 10,000 insurance companies that waste $238 Billion dollars annually.

# The Insurance Platform
# for
RRGs
TPAs
Book a Demo
![third](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/Home Screen Image@2x.260196e3.png)
One place for your insurance management needs
![claims management screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/ClaimsManagementScreens.a98097ce.png)
Claims Management
![financials screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/FinancialsScreens.0cc862f3.png)
Financials

Digital Portal & Application Process
![premium billing screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/PremiumBillingScreens.be490bf1.png)
Premium Billing
![policy issuance screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/PolicyIssuanceScreens.9cfe5478.png)
Policy Issuance & Signature
![rating engine screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/RatingEngineScreens.45ef8682.png)
Rating Engine
![data management screens](https://www.aiinsurance.io/_next/static/media/DataManagementScreens.73412a4e.png)
Data Management
AI
Explore how AI revolutionizes insurance processes, enhances customer experiences, and drives efficiency in the insurance industry. We automate large aspects of your process so you get time back.
Invoice Auditing
Received an invoice from defense counsel? Forward the email to AI Insurance and we’ll read it, parse it, and upload it.
Then, we’ll audit the line items against your defense counsel guidelines. No more paying legal fees outside of your guidelines!
Application Parsing
Just drag-and-drop received applications into AI Insurance and we’ll extract all the data and populate your application.
Indemnity Prediction
We’re 25% more accurate than adjusters. Once you’ve been on AI Insurance for at least a year, we can predict the cost of your claims using AI and offer you recommendations.
AI Insurance has been built solely to meet the needs of insurance programs and can easily be configured to meet your specific objectives
Free claims management for <25 claims/year
Unlimited custom report building
Unlimited data and document storage
One place for all your insurance management needs
Unlimited users and logins
Permission every function
AI-backed automation
Self-reconciling billing and invoicing
## Testimonials
I have been doing insurance technology work for more than 20 years and yours was the best presentation I have seen. Been through Guidewire, DuckCreek, every agency management system one can imagine, plus implementations with EY, Cognizant, IBM et al. I’m sure you know it already, but you are onto something very big. I was very impressed with your facility with both tech and insurance. Way to go!
RRG Attorney
In record time, AI Insurance delivered an intuitive, easy-to-navigate platform that allows us to view, edit, manipulate, and understand all of our data with a minimal amount of clicks. My first impression was “it's beautiful!”
Julie Bordo
CEO of PCH Mutual RRG
AI Insurance developed a claims management system that is so refined and easy to use that we were able to bring claims in-house—a tremendous benefit to our company.
RRG CEO
I have only glowing things to say about the company, its CEO, and their dedication to our industry, innovation and providing the most high-quality software to meet our evolving needs.
RRG CEO
After 18 years in the industry, as a Program Manager and TPA for several PL/GL programs, AI Insurance has proven to be the best choice for the software system for Magnolia and its clients. We have no regrets and have found the staff at AI to be phenomenally responsive in addressing any questions or issues and I can heartily recommend AI.
Robert Bates
President of Magnolia LTC
I am beyond speechless. This would make our claims manager business incredible.
Liability Claims Adjuster
AI Insurance is the best platform we've used to manage our clients, their claims and policies, all synced together in one place and supported by a great team!
Michael Richards
President, Westwood Insurance Group
I'm just absolutely floored. I love it, I love the system.
Liability Claims Adjuster
I've seen lots of systems in my long career and that's stunning.
Fronting Carrier CEO
I have not seen any other platform that appears to have what you have
Carrier CEO
I am blown away with your system.
Program Manager
Want to learn more?
Book a Demo
[AI Insurance](https://www.aiinsurance.io/</>)

generated_description:
**AI Insurance: Revolutionizing the Insurance Industry with AI**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W19, AI Insurance embodies innovation in the insurance sector. Based in San Francisco, this ten-person team has set out to transform how small to midsize insurance companies operate. They provide a comprehensive platform designed to streamline every facet of an insurance business—essentially doing for insurance what Salesforce did for sales.

**The Problem and the Opportunity**

Before AI Insurance arrived on the scene, many insurance companies relied heavily on outdated systems—think spreadsheets and filing cabinets. This inefficiency bled an astonishing 60% of revenue into administrative costs. With over 10,000 insurance companies wasting approximately $238 billion annually, there's a fertile landscape for change. 

**What They Do**

The AI Insurance platform is tailored for various insurance programs, including Risk Retention Groups (RRGs) and Third-Party Administrators (TPAs). It consolidates all insurance management needs into one user-friendly interface. Features include:

- **Claims Management:** Automated processing that saves time and reduces errors.
- **Financial Management:** Comprehensive financial tracking for better management of resources.
- **Digital Portals & Application Processes:** Simplifying client interactions.
- **Premium Billing and Policy Issuance:** Facilitating smoother financial transactions.
- **Data Management:** Centralized storage for all essential documents.

Moreover, the platform leverages AI to enhance automation across processes, helping operators focus more on growth and less on admin tasks. For instance, invoice auditing can be done by simply forwarding emails, while application parsing requires no more than a drag-and-drop.

As a nod to its effectiveness, AI Insurance claims that after a year of usage, it can predict claims costs with 25% greater accuracy than traditional adjusters. 

**Customer Praise**

The feedback from the industry is overwhelmingly positive. Clients describe the platform as “intuitive,” “beautiful,” and one of the best systems they’ve encountered throughout their insurance careers. Several have transitioned to in-house claims management, crediting AI Insurance for the ease and efficiency it provides.

**Why It Matters**

In a world where efficiency and accuracy are paramount, AI Insurance is equipped to meet the evolving needs of modern insurance companies. By enabling automation and data-driven decision-making, they're not just saving costs; they're paving the way for a smarter, more agile insurance industry.

For more information, check them out at [AI Insurance](https://www.aiinsurance.io).

---

In essence, AI Insurance is tackling a massive market inefficiency with a solution that benefits both insurers and their clients alike. If you're part of the insurance industry and tired of drowning in spreadsheets, it might be time to take a closer look.
